Class GridLabelRenderer.Styles

    • com.jjoe64.graphview.GridLabelRenderer.Styles
  • Enclosing class:
    GridLabelRenderer

    public final class GridLabelRenderer.Styles
extends java.lang.Object
    wrapper for the styles regarding to the grid and the labels
